price: Ia berkata, "Ya Tuhan-ku, sesungguhnya tulangku telah lemah dan kepalaku telah ditumbuhi uban dan aku belum pernah kecewa dalam berdoa kepada Engkau, ya Tuhan-ku.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَهَنَ ٱلۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّي وَٱشۡتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأۡسُ شَيۡبٗا وَلَمۡ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī wahana al-ʿaẓmu minnī wa-ish'taʿala al-rasu shayban walam akun biduʿāika rabbi shaqiyyan
